plain:
Blade Runner, Dark City, Edward Scissorhands, and Shanghai Noon are all science fiction. Brassed Off, FairyTale: A True Story, and The Great Muppet Caper are not. High Fidelity is fiction. Trainspotting and Return of the Jedi are not. This suggests that the user's favourite genre is science fiction.

The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be complex, as all of the user's favourite movies have complex plots. The user's favourite kind of musical score is likely to be orchestral, as all of the user's favourite movies have orchestral scores. The user's favourite mood for the musical score is likely to be dark, as all of the user's favourite movies have dark scores. The user's favourite setting is likely to be futuristic, as all of the user's favourite movies are set in the future. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be dark and gritty, as all of the user's favourite movies have this visual style. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be complex, as all of the user's favourite movies have complex writing. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be long, as all of the user's favourite movies are long. The user's favourite themes are likely to be complex and dark, as all of the user's favourite movies have complex and dark themes.
brassed off, fairytale: and the great muppet caper are not
